overview:
Jeff is an entrepreneur changing the way small product-based business owners think about technology and business.

With 6 years of I.T. & Operations Management experience, Jeff found that most product-based accounting software platforms were overly complicated to setup and too time consuming to maintain. With a passion for simplifying business operations for small businesses, he set out to develop an easier solution.

After two and a half years of development, Simple Numbers was released to help small product-based businesses manage their customers, vendors, products, packages, purchase orders and invoices with ease. The Software as a Serivce (SaaS) platform helps small businesses save money by avoiding a significant hardware and software investment while simplifying their operations, streamlining their billing process and reducing overhead costs.

He is currently overseeing Product Management and Business Development.

Known for his tenacity, attention to detail, and thorough understanding of business processes, Jeff also offers consulting for small business clients to manage their evolving technology needs.

When he’s not working, Jeff can be found cooking, driving, hiking, biking, kayaking or mentoring students on practical business management.

Specialties: Business Development, Operations Management, Process Development, I.T Management, I.T. Design & Installation, Web Software Development, Accounting, Database Management, Human Resources, Purchasing Control, Strategic Growth, Technology Innovation, Product Development, Account Management, Vendor Relations
